mapper.select: select id from t_projects where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_projects(id, start_time, end_time, sojourn) values(#{id}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{sojourn})
mapper.update: update t_projects set end_time = #{end_time} where id = #{id} update t_projects set sojourn = #{sojourn} where id = #{id}
